twice in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">1</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each tree horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We then move each feature to the highest solid block (which might be underwater)</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_all_of"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="3"></mutation><value name="condition0"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value><value name="condition1"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value><value name="condition2"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_tag"><field name="tag">minecraft:sand</field></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="feature_tree_simple" x="1061" y="369"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="type">acacia</field><field name="base_height">5</field><field name="height_variation_a">2</field><field name="height_variation_b">2</field><field name="force_dirt">FALSE</field><field name="ignore_vines">TRUE</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents an acacia tree, and should generate during the VEGETAL_DECORATION stage.</comment><value name="dirt"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DIRT#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed under the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="trunk"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.LOG2#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the trunk</comment></block></value><value name="foliage"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.LEAVES2#0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used for the leaves</comment></block></value><value name="root_placer"><block type="root_placer_none"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Acacia trees don't have roots</comment></block></value></block><block type="placement_count" x="922" y="895"><comment pinned="false" h="105" w="222">Placement modifiers are processed from top to bottom. We try to place 4 trees in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">3</field></block></value></block><block type="placement_block_survival_filter" x="1038" y="948"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Finally, we check if the position is actually valid. Trees should generate only on blocks that support their sapling.</comment><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.DEADBUSH</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block used to check for the tree position. Generally it should be the sapling of the tree.</comment></block></value></block><block type="block_predicate_is_air" x="997" y="1055"></block><block type="block_predicate_has_sturdy_face" x="272" y="1197"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><field name="direction">UP</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We check if the block below the current position has a solid face UP</comment></block><block type="block_predicate_all_of" x="1004" y="1172"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="2"></mutation></block><block type="block_predicate_not" x="-70" y="1270"></block></xml>
